price: 191. ¿Adoran fuera de Al-lah divinidades que no son capaces de crear nada mientras que ellas han sido creadas,
arabic: أَيُشۡرِكُونَ مَا لَا يَخۡلُقُ شَيۡـٔٗا وَهُمۡ يُخۡلَقُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: ayush'rikūna mā lā yakhluqu shayan wahum yukh'laqūna
